examples: For him, the world was something comprehensible by the powers of the human intellect: it became an object, a thing, like other things.
All it does is make the sound louder and it doesn't really make it more comprehensible.
Sometimes labels and wall texts and audio guides are really good and can give you the little nuggets of info you need that make the work more comprehensible and enjoyable.
I think we just-- we just look at it in a way that makes it comprehensible, tells the story in a succinct way.
And there are captions, like I said, when you see Jake's video, it's kind of useful, you know, for the most part, there's a comprehensible sentence but the last two words aren't very perfect.
words.defineEn: capable of being understood or grasped by the mind
words.defineVi: có khả năng được hiểu hoặc nắm bắt bởi tâm trí

examples: Dolphins have even demonstrated language comprehension.
And your work is beyond comprehension.
The level of addiction is beyond anyone's comprehension.
Type omega civilizations might be the actual creators of our universe, for reasons beyond our comprehension.
Then, they tested their comprehension after making them double their speed.
words.defineEn: the ability or process of understanding
words.defineVi: khả năng hoặc quá trình hiểu biết

examples: Fifty five countries have imposed comprehensive restrictions on the manufacturing, import and distribution of bags.
This series isn't going to be comprehensive.
So in 2013, you have comprehensive immigration reform.
Satellites now give comprehensive views of what he meant.
We need comprehensive legislation to turn off the tap.
words.defineEn: providing broad and extensive coverage or understanding of a subject or topic
words.defineVi: cung cấp phạm vi bao quát và rộng rãi hoặc sự hiểu biết về một chủ đề hoặc chủ đề

examples: Antigen assays don't have that advantage.
But before human tests, and before animal tests, researchers start with simpler assays.
Scientists call this type of test a sandwich assay.
You can see the controls here in the left column of each assay plate.
words.defineEn: analyze (chemical substances)
words.defineVi: phân tích (chất hóa học)

examples: I think he knew, when he essentially gave his unenthusiastic assent to Pelosi and Reid to go ahead and let’s get this done, he was doing what McCain often talked about.
words.defineEn: to agree to something, such as a suggestion, request, etc.
words.defineVi: để đồng ý với một cái gì đó, chẳng hạn như một đề nghị, yêu cầu, vv

words.defineEn: state categorically
words.defineVi: nhà nước phân loại

words.defineEn: working very hard and with careful attention to detail so that everything is done as well as possible
words.defineVi: làm việc rất chăm chỉ và chú ý cẩn thận đến từng chi tiết để mọi thứ được thực hiện tốt nhất có thể

examples: We can have a nonflammable masonry material like block or something on that order, and then use a nonflammable material for effacing and boxing OKAY.
words.defineEn: remove by or as if by rubbing or erasing
words.defineVi: loại bỏ bằng cách hoặc như thể bằng cách cọ xát hoặc xóa

words.defineEn: deprived of vigor and the ability to be effective
words.defineVi: thiếu sức sống và khả năng có hiệu quả

examples: To save a penalty.
I sure paid the penalty for staying up late when I fell asleep at my desk in the library.
They finished with the wooden spoon after losing a penalty shoot-out.
He wasted a golden opportunity when he missed from the penalty spot.
With only a couple minutes remaining in the game, the forward is going to have to make this penalty shot count.
words.defineEn: a punishment or consequence imposed as a result of violating rules
words.defineVi: một hình phạt hoặc hậu quả áp đặt do vi phạm các quy tắc

examples: As penance for being such a little Hemingway about this stuff, you will one day have to host a show about the glorious ambiguity of literature.
Now many of Luther’s objections to Church teachings were highly theological, concerning beliefs about, say, whether the word repent in the Bible can be said to refer to the sacrament of penance.
Yes, but first you feel that I need to do some penance for what happened in Quebec, Is that right?
words.defineEn: remorse for your past conduct
words.defineVi: hối hận về hành vi trong quá khứ của bạn

examples: WILLIAM BRANGHAM: You and all of the signatories of this letter argue that this is pretty crystal-clear evidence, in your mind, as former prosecutors, that you could have brought a case on these.
words.defineEn: a person, organization, or country that has signed a formal agreement
words.defineVi: một người, tổ chức hoặc quốc gia đã ký một thỏa thuận chính thức

words.defineEn: the message that is intended or expressed or signified
words.defineVi: thông điệp được dự định hoặc thể hiện hoặc biểu thị

words.defineEn: slow and apathetic
words.defineVi: chậm chạp và thờ ơ

examples: Animals enter a deep sleep, or torpor, to slow down their metabolism and reduce their activity during hot periods in order to survive.
After all this fighting, feeding, and flying, hummingbirds sometimes need to sleep off the day’s events in a mild form of hibernation called torpor.
And it’s also been suggested that they could’ve been able to enter a state of torpor or hibernation, again like modern mouse and dwarf lemurs do.
words.defineEn: inactivity resulting from lethargy and lack of vigor or energy
words.defineVi: không hoạt động do thờ ơ và thiếu sức sống hoặc năng lượng

examples: I don't like the idea that the bowels are all bloated and distended.
words.defineEn: become wider
words.defineVi: trở nên rộng hơn

words.defineEn: capable of being distended; able to stretch and expand
words.defineVi: có khả năng bị căng phồng; có thể kéo dài và mở rộng

words.defineEn: the act of expanding by pressure from within
words.defineVi: hành động mở rộng bởi áp lực từ bên trong

examples: The matter here is compressed by the weight of the entire star above it.
The wall cushions are compressed by the roof cushion.
It's going to compress that circle down.
Your spine is being compressed by gravity.
so whole ranges compress as their own weight basically crushes their base.
words.defineEn: to press two things together or be pressed together to become smaller
words.defineVi: để ép hai thứ lại với nhau hoặc được ép lại với nhau để trở nên nhỏ hơn

examples: Also water is incompressible whereas air is compressible.
It works by having tiny, compressible pieces called fiber Bragg gratings, embedded in optical fibers.
words.defineEn: capable of being easily compressed
words.defineVi: có khả năng dễ dàng nén
